title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Dining Room Andirons", February 5, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower left: 1 1/2/DILLMANN/FEBR, 5TH, 37; upper left in graphite: DINING ROOM/FIRE PLACE; center: PAINTED PLY-WOOD; lower center: METAL CHANEL; right: METAL CHANEL; dimensions in graphite
description: Elevation for dining room andirons and fireplace. Tall, flat front section of andiron with finial at top; rounded corner at bottom and straight feet. Fireplace surround in painted plywood with metal chanel border.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Dining Room Andirons", February 5, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-753.
